#summary Summary of all pages contained in a single showcase

|| *Page* || *Description* ||
|| [PageLogin Login] || Page with login form and link to register page ||
|| [PageRegister Register] || Page with form to register a new account ||
|| [PageShowMessages Show messages] || Page with a form to submit a new message and a list of the newest messages of users followed by the logged in user ||
|| [PageShowFriends Show friends] || Page with a list of users followed by the current user ||
||  [PageSearchNewFriends Search new friends] || Page to search a user and to follow him ||
||  [PageEditProfile Edit profile] || Page to edit the profile of the current user ||
